import cause1 from './images/afghanistan.jpg' const Cause1= ({props}) => { var target_amount = 25000000; var target_amount_str = '$' + target_amount; var current_donations = 1000; var current_donations_str = '$' + current_donations; return (
Hello gee1
Save Afghanistan

With the freezeing cold winter and collapsing economy, people of Afghanistan barely have anything to eat. Let us all come together to help them.

); } export default Cause1;
